name: Jinbe
text: On K.O. Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'BANDAI MADE IN JAPAN' indicates it is not a real card from a published set. The ID 'P-030' is used as a placeholder.
